Proverbs 31:10-31

RoG ladies ministry is  about helping women know  and grow in relationship with God through Jesus Christ. It’s about encouraging ladies to understand the gospel, respond to the gospel and apply the gospel to every aspect of life.

Our aim is to ensure every woman in this congregation has the opportunity to:

  1. Hear and respond to the gospel (Acts 16:13-15)
  2. Grow in godliness (Ephesians 4:22)
  3. Be spurred on to love and good works (Hebrews 10:24)
  4. Be equipped for service (Ephesians 4:12)
  5. Be active in making disciples (Matthew 28:16-20)
